guicomponents
Class GWinApplet

java.lang.Object
  PApplet
      guicomponents.GWinApplet
All Implemented Interfaces:
GConstants
public class GWinApplet
extends PApplet
implements GConstants

CLASS FOR INTERNAL USE ONLY
This class extends PApplet and provides a drawing surface for the GWindow class. Do not instantiate objects of this class, create GWindow objects instead.

Author:
Peter Lager
